name: Primary Color Reborn
description:
An Infinity game about avoiding the primary color man

CONTROLS:

W/A/S/D:  move

Left/Right mouse butom:  punch/ grab itens

RULES:

-If the enemy is red, They are made out of flesh. Anything can kill it.

-It it is blue, they are mad out of glass. It will absorb the material that hit it.

-If it is yellow, it is made out of concrete. The only way to kill is by breaking it with a wepon made of the same material.

Anything else can be hurt to slow it down, but not killed.

goood luck :)
